title: What's a good KD for a FPS game?
body:
I'm playing a great browser FPS game called Rush Team and my KD ratio atm is 9.6
Kills: 926
Deaths: 967
I'm guessing 1.0 is good?

Here's a link if you want to try the game it's really fun and it's a browser game. You have to 
have Firefox or some other browser that supports unity though, Google chrome used to but not anymore.
http://www.asr-games.net/index.php?page=Game
